quagga.input.body:
Below, is an attachement of a Daily Risk Reporting Checklist for Book 
Administration.  The checklist was developed as an aid in helping ensure 
books are officialized.  If you have any suggestions on making this checklist 
more comprehensive please advise.  

Thank You

Joel
